title: LIVING SCRIPTURES COLLECTION
description:
I have collected several Living Scriptures titles. Some from the New Testament, some from the Old. Some from the Book of Mormon and a couple of LDS Church history I seem to recall. You can view these if you have a divx codec installed on you computer. (Available at divx.com for free)

The music is great and they are good for the whole family especially children. 

Enjoy and please seed what parts you can.
